    • Method Detail

      • isConnected

      • close

        void close()
        This should be called when you stop using the port. This will prevent port locking on platforms like Linux.

      • serialEvent

        public void serialEvent(gnu.io.SerialPortEvent oEvent)
        reads a single byte of data from the serial connection Since SerialConnection does not understand the protocol formats it passes the byte back to Coordinator for processing
        Specified by:
        serialEvent in interface gnu.io.SerialPortEventListener
